defaults.noValue: No data or Sensor not supported

targets.query: SELECT count("exception") FROM "ALARMING" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/) AND ALARM_TYPE=~/RED.*|TAIL.*/ and $timeFilter GROUP BY "ALARM_TYPE", "LINKNAME", queue_name, queue_id

defaults.noValue: No data or Sensor not supported

targets.query: select sum(cos_fw) from (SELECT "cos_forwarded_octets_rate"*8 as cos_fw FROM "INTERFACES" WHERE "SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/  and "if_name" =~ /^(et|xe|ge).*/  and if_unit='' and $timeFilter GROUP BY if_name,  "queue_id") group by queue_id

defaults.noValue: No data or Sensor not supported

targets.query: SELECT "exception" FROM "ALARMING" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/) AND $timeFilter and ALARM_TYPE=~/RED.*|TAIL.*/ GROUP BY "ALARM_TYPE", "LINKNAME", queue_id, queue_name

defaults.noValue: No data or Sensor not supported

targets.query: SELECT mean("in_octets_rate")*8  FROM "INTERFACES" WHERE (SHORTNAME =~ /^$rtr$/ AND LINKNAME = '$ifname' and if_unit='') AND $timeFilter group by time($sample_interval)
SELECT mean("out_octets_rate")*8 FROM "INTERFACES" WHERE (SHORTNAME =~ /^$rtr$/ AND LINKNAME = '$ifname'  and if_unit='') AND $timeFilter group by time($sample_interval)

defaults.noValue: No data or Sensor not supported

targets.query: SELECT mean("in_pkts_rate")  FROM "INTERFACES" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND LINKNAME = '$ifname' and if_unit='') AND $timeFilter group by time($sample_interval)
SELECT mean("out_pkts_rate") FROM "INTERFACES" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND LINKNAME = '$ifname' and if_unit='') AND $timeFilter group by time($sample_interval)

defaults.noValue: No data or Sensor not supported

targets.query: SELECT mean("in_pkts_rate") - (mean("bcast_in_pkts_rate")+mean("mcast_in_pkts_rate"))  FROM "INTERFACES" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND LINKNAME = '$ifname' and if_unit='')AND $timeFilter group by time($sample_interval)

SELECT mean("out_pkts_rate") - (mean("bcast_out_pkts_rate")+mean("mcast_out_pkts_rate"))  FROM "INTERFACES" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND LINKNAME = '$ifname' and if_unit='') AND $timeFilter group by time($sample_interval)
SELECT mean("mcast_in_pkts_rate")  FROM "INTERFACES" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND LINKNAME = '$ifname' and if_unit='') AND $timeFilter group by time($sample_interval)
SELECT mean("mcast_out_pkts_rate")  FROM "INTERFACES" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND LINKNAME = '$ifname' and if_unit='') AND $timeFilter group by time($sample_interval)
SELECT mean("bcast_in_pkts_rate")  FROM "INTERFACES" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND LINKNAME = '$ifname' and if_unit='') AND $timeFilter group by time($sample_interval)
SELECT mean("bcast_out_pkts_rate") FROM "INTERFACES" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND LINKNAME = '$ifname' and if_unit='') AND $timeFilter group by time($sample_interval)

panels.title: Port statistics Pps Traffic - per Type - $ifname

defaults.noValue: No data or Sensor not supported

targets.query: SELECT mean("cos_red_dropped_packets_rate") FROM "INTERFACES" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND LINKNAME = '$ifname' and if_unit='') and  $timeFilter GROUP BY "queue_id",  time($sample_interval)
SELECT mean("cos_tail_dropped_packets_rate") FROM "INTERFACES" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND LINKNAME = '$ifname' and if_unit='') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($sample_interval), "queue_id"

defaults.noValue: No data or Sensor not supported

targets.query: SELECT last("cos_buffer_cur")/last("cos_buffer_size")*100 as value FROM "INTERFACES" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND LINKNAME = '$ifname' and if_unit='') and $timeFilter group by queue_id fill(null)

defaults.noValue: No data or Sensor not supported

targets.query: SELECT last("cos_buffer_peak")/last("cos_buffer_size")*100 FROM "INTERFACES" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND LINKNAME = '$ifname' and if_unit='') and $timeFilter group by queue_id fill(null)

defaults.noValue: No data or Sensor not supported

targets.query: SELECT "cos_forwarded_octets_rate"*8 FROM "INTERFACES" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND LINKNAME = '$ifname' and if_unit='')  and $timeFilter GROUP BY "queue_id" fill(0)

defaults.noValue: No data or Sensor not supported

targets.query: SELECT max(value) from (select last("voq_cos_buffer_cur_percent") as value FROM "JUNOS_QMON" WHERE ("SHORTNAME" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND LINKNAME = '$ifname') and $timeFilter group by queue_id, pfe_index, _component_id, _subcomponent_id) group by queue_id fill(null)
